## Step 2: Run Debut Video Capture Software and Click on Register
 
Once you have installed Debut Video Capture Software, run it and you will see the main interface. On the top right corner, you will see a button that says "Register". Click on it and you will be prompted to enter your serial code.
 
Don't worry, you don't need to buy one. Just click on the link that says "Get it Free" and you will be redirected to a webpage where you can get your free serial code.
 
## Step 3: Complete a Short Survey or Offer to Get Your Free Serial Code
 
On the webpage that you are redirected to, you will see a list of surveys or offers that you can complete to get your free serial code. These are provided by third-party sponsors who want to get your feedback or promote their products or services.
 
You can choose any survey or offer that interests you and complete it in a few minutes. Some of them may require you to enter your email address, phone number, or other personal information. Make sure you use a valid and active email address because that's where your free serial code will be sent.
 
After completing the survey or offer, check your email inbox and look for an email from NCH Software that contains your free serial code. It may take a few minutes or hours for the email to arrive, so be patient.
 
## Step 4: Enter Your Free Serial Code and Enjoy Debut Video Capture Software
 
Once you have received your free serial code, go back to Debut Video Capture Software and enter it in the registration window. Click on "Register" and you will see a confirmation message that says "Thank you for registering Debut Video Capture Software".
 
Congratulations! You have successfully registered Debut Video Capture Software with a free serial code. Now you can enjoy all the features and benefits of this amazing software without paying anything.
